name: Rahim Wardak
story: Majeed is a skilled soldier with years of experience as a missile specialist. He has served in several conflicts across the Middle East and is known for his calm demeanor and unwavering loyalty to his comrades. Despite his formidable skills on the battlefield, Majeed struggles to find purpose outside of the military and often feels lost when he's not fighting for his country. He hopes to one day find a greater sense of meaning in his life.
